title: Investing, Markets, And The SALT Tax
itunes:title: Investing, Markets, And The SALT Tax
description:
Sean O’Hara, President of Pacer ETFs, discusses investing and the economy. Aysha Bagchi, Legal Reporter with Bloomberg Industry Group, discusses the SALT Tax. Mike Vogelzang, CIO & Managing Director at CaptTrust, discusses markets, inflation, and the economy in 2022. David Kudla, founder and CEO of Mainstay Capital Management, talks about the market reaction to the Ukraine war and the Fed. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
